gnu.math.statistics
Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gnu.math.statistics.Statistics
public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object

This class gives a Binomial distribution with n values of probability p.

Clamp the value x between r and p.

Parameters:
